nodes.text: Reiyo Barnes was an inhabitant of the Raider's Cove on Rishi during the Galactic War. Born on Rishi, he spent his whole life there, despite having many chances to leave. His family lost their home in the Ravager Raids and eventually all but Reiyo succumbed to the Corellian Tanamen Fever. In 3637 BBY, Barnes was cured of the plague by the Hero of Tython, to whom he later sent a letter of thanks.
